Convert an object to a pf object

pf_as_pf.Rd

Convert an object to a pf object

Usage

pf_as_pf(x, ...)

Arguments

x

An object to convert

...

Other arguments pass to or from other methods.

Value

a pf object with branch lengths as features

Examples

pf_as_pf(ape::rtree(100))
#> # A tibble: 198 × 3
#>    label is_tip phlo
